mapper.select: select count(*) from board where boardSort = 2

select rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardHits, boardDate, boardSort from (select rownum rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardHits, to_char(boardDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') boardDate, boardSort from (select boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardHits, boardDate, boardSort from board order by boardDate desc)) where (rno between #{start} and #{end}) and (boardSort = '2')

select rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardHits, boardDate, boardSort from (select rownum rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardHits, to_char(boardDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') boardDate, boardSort from (select boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardHits, boardDate, boardSort from board order by boardDate desc) where boardSort = '2') where rno < 4
select boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, boardHits, boardDate, boardSort, boardCategory from board where boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into board ( boardIdx, memberId, boardHits, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardUpdateDate, boardSort, boardCategory ) values ( sequ_board_boardIdx.nextval, #{memberId}, 0, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, null, #{boardSort}, #{boardCategory} )
mapper.update: update board set boardTitle = #{boardTitle}, boardContent = #{boardContent}, boardUpdateDate = sysdate, boardSort = #{boardSort}, boardCategory = #{boardCategory} where boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
